Even though it allows you to pick a size for yourself such a small medium and large, when you get it, it is one size fits all. I would be an extra large or large and something like this and it’s a little snug on my hips. The pattern also is slightly askew on the back top waist line because they use a separate fabric or piece to the top of the skirt like a wrap around and do like the flow part down so to me my pattern was slightly off, but I’d wear a shirt that covers it anyways.

I got this skirt to match my color analysis/new capsule wardrobe. I loved the soft, dusty colors and the fluttery hem. What arrived instead was a completely different skirt. The colors are completely different, the hem is wavy and the waistband is very wide and unflattering. The only way to wear it would be like a training bra for my belly. I couldnt find a color swatch for the skirt I received so I think the only way this happened was a photo was stolen from someone else and slapped onto this listing. I’m so disappointed.
It's a pretty skirt, the material feels kinda like paper. The fit is accurate to size. I wish it was a little stretchier. Price isn't bad.
